_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
mn49:2.1+mn49:30.18^who_else_mentioned: Baka, Brahmā, Māra, Mendicant, the Wielder of Power, Maker, Begetter, Lady Luck, Wicked One, Māra the Wicked, Baka the Brahmā, Gotama, Sakyan, Buddhas, The Realized One
before^mn49:31.1^where: Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's monastery, Ukkaṭṭhā, Subhaga Forest
where: Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's monastery, Ukkaṭṭhā, Subhaga Forest
